description: Runs an arbitrary RPC over NetConf on an Juniper JUNOS device

output.description: The C(output) argument specifies the desired output of the return data.  This argument accepts one of C(xml), C(text), or C(json).  For C(json), the JUNOS device must be running a version of software that supports native JSON output.

rpc.description: The C(rpc) argument specifies the RPC call to send to the remote devices to be executed.  The RPC Reply message is parsed and the contents are returned to the playbook.

args.description: The C(args) argument provides a set of arguments for the RPC call and are encoded in the request message.  This argument accepts a set of key=value arguments.

provider.description: A dict object containing connection details.
